cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud

Class MultiCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.MultiCloud

  • public class MultiCloud
extends java.lang.Object
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud/MultiCloud.java

    The MultiCloud library. All methods are synchronous. For asynchronous usage, external threading should be used.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

      • accountInfo

        public AccountInfo accountInfo(java.lang.String accountName)
                        throws MultiCloudException,
                               OAuth2SettingsException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieve basic information about the user. Information consists of user name and identifier.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        Returns:
        Information about the user.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • accountQuota

        public AccountQuota accountQuota(java.lang.String accountName)
                          throws MultiCloudException,
                                 OAuth2SettingsException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieve information about the quota associated with the user account.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        Returns:
        Quota information.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • addDownloadSource

        public void addDownloadSource(java.lang.String accountName,
                     FileInfo sourceFile)
                       throws MultiCloudException
        Adds a new source for download from multiple cloud storage services.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        sourceFile - File to be downloaded.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.

      • authorizeAccount

        public void authorizeAccount(java.lang.String accountName,
                    AuthorizationCallback callback)
                      throws MultiCloudException,
                             OAuth2SettingsException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs the authorization process for the specified user account. For certain authorization flows, this operation is blocking.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        callback - Callback from the authorization process, if necessary.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If some parameters were wrong.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the authorization process was interrupted.

      • copy

        public FileInfo copy(java.lang.String accountName,
            FileInfo file,
            FileInfo destination,
            java.lang.String destinationName)
              throws MultiCloudException,
                     OAuth2SettingsException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Copy existing file or folder to new destination.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        file - Original file or folder to be copied.
        destination - Folder to copy the source to.
        destinationName - File or folder name in the destination location. Null to retain original.
        Returns:
        File or folder information after copying.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(java.lang.String accountName,
                 java.lang.String cloudStorage)
                   throws MultiCloudException
        Creates new user account and stores it in the account manager.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name for the user account.
        cloudStorage - Name of the cloud storage service provider.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the given parameters were wrong.

      • createFolder

        public FileInfo createFolder(java.lang.String accountName,
                    java.lang.String folderName,
                    FileInfo parent)
                      throws MultiCloudException,
                             OAuth2SettingsException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates new folder in the specified location.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        folderName - Name of the folder.
        parent - Parent folder.
        Returns:
        Newly created folder.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.

                throws MultiCloudException,

        Returns:

        accountName - Name of the user account.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the given parameter was wrong.

      • downloadFile

        public java.io.File downloadFile(java.lang.String accountName,
                        FileInfo sourceFile,
                        java.io.File destination,
                        boolean overwrite)
                          throws MultiCloudException,
                                 OAuth2SettingsException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Download file from a single destination.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        sourceFile - File to be downloaded.
        destination - Location to save the file to.
        overwrite - If existing files should be overwritten.
        Returns:
        File downloaded.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • listFolder

                  FileInfo folder,
                  boolean showDeleted,
                  boolean showShared)
                    throws MultiCloudException,
                           OAuth2SettingsException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        List the contents of the supplied folder.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        folder - Folder to be listed.
        showDeleted - If deleted content should be listed.
        showShared - If files shared with the user should be listed.
        Returns:
        Folder contents.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

              throws MultiCloudException,
                     OAuth2SettingsException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Move existing file or folder to new destination.

        file - Original file or folder to be moved.
        destination - Folder to move the source to.
        destinationName - File or folder name in the destination location. Null to retain original.

        File or folder information after moving.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • refreshAccount

        public void refreshAccount(java.lang.String accountName,
                  AuthorizationCallback callback)
                    throws MultiCloudException,
                           OAuth2SettingsException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs the process for access token refreshing. Should be used only if the OAuth2Token contains refresh token, otherwise it fails.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        callback - Callback from the authorization process, if necessary.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If some parameters were wrong.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the authorization process was interrupted.

      • rename

        public FileInfo rename(java.lang.String accountName,
              FileInfo file,
              java.lang.String fileName)
                throws MultiCloudException,
                       OAuth2SettingsException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Renames the supplied file or folder.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        file - File or folder to be renamed.
        fileName - New file or folder name.
        Returns:
        File or folder information after renaming.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • uploadFile

        public FileInfo uploadFile(java.lang.String accountName,
                  FileInfo destination,
                  java.lang.String destinationName,
                  boolean overwrite,
                  java.io.File data)
                    throws MultiCloudException,
                           OAuth2SettingsException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Upload the supplied file to the desired cloud storage service.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        destination - Destination file or folder to be moved to.
        destinationName - New name at the destination location.
        overwrite - If the destination file should be overwritten.
        data - File to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        File information about the uploaded file.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • uploadFile

        public FileInfo uploadFile(java.lang.String accountName,
                  FileInfo destination,
                  java.lang.String destinationName,
                  boolean overwrite,
                  java.io.InputStream data,
                  long size)
                    throws MultiCloudException,
                           OAuth2SettingsException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Upload the supplied file to the desired cloud storage service.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Name of the user account.
        destination - Destination file or folder to be moved to.
        destinationName - New name at the destination location.
        overwrite - If the destination file should be overwritten.
        data - Data stream of the uploaded file.
        size - Size of the uploaded file.
        Returns:
        File information about the uploaded file.
        Throws:
        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
        OAuth2SettingsException - If the authorization failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the token refreshing process was interrupted.

      • validateAccounts

        public void validateAccounts()
        Validates all user account entries and remove broken links and unused tokens.
